pageProps.toc: [{"url":"#","text":"Overview","depth":2},{"url":"#development-prompt","depth":2,"text":"开发提示词 "},{"url":"#usage","depth":2,"text":"使用方法 "},{"url":"#use-cli-ai","depth":3,"text":"方法一：使用 skills（推荐） "},{"url":"#use-chat","depth":3,"text":"方法二：在 AI 对话中手动使用 "}]
pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["结构开发相对复杂，AntV Infographic 为",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/design#structure","children":"结构"}],"整理了可直接复用的 skill，基于 any-skills 管理，因此 Claude Code 或 Codex 都能读取并使用这些技能来生成高质量代码。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"development-prompt","children":"开发提示词 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"结构相关的规则与模板已整理为 skill 的参考文档，位于："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":".skills/infographic-structure-creator/SKILL.md"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":".skills/infographic-structure-creator/references/structure-prompt.md"}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"其中包含以下内容："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"结构分类体系（列表、对比、顺序、层级、关系、地理、统计图）"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"技术规范（类型定义、可用组件、工具函数）"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"代码模板（简单结构、层级结构）"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"布局计算要点"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"按钮布局原则"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"命名规范"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"生成流程"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"示例代码"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"usage","children":"使用方法 "}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"use-cli-ai","children":"方法一：使用 skills（推荐） "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在 Claude Code 或 Codex 中",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"一次性提出需求"}],"即可，例如："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"请使用 skill: infographic-structure-creator，帮我开发一个循环流程结构。数据项围成一个圆形排列，相邻项之间有箭头连接，形成闭环。每个数据项可以添加、删除。
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"生成后 AI 会直接创建结构文件并完成导出，只需在 Dev 环境验证布局与交互即可。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"use-chat","children":"方法二：在 AI 对话中手动使用 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果你更偏好手动复制提示内容，可以直接读取参考文档："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"cat .skills/infographic-structure-creator/references/structure-prompt.md
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"将内容粘贴给 AI 后，描述需求并生成代码。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"无论采用哪种方式，提交前都请在 Dev 环境验证布局与交互是否符合预期。"}]]}]]
pageProps.tocEn: [{"url":"#","text":"Overview","depth":2},{"url":"#development-prompt","depth":2,"text":"Development Prompt "},{"url":"#usage","depth":2,"text":"Usage "},{"url":"#use-cli-ai","depth":3,"text":"Method 1: Use skills (Recommended) "},{"url":"#use-chat","depth":3,"text":"Method 2: Manual use in an AI chat "}]
pageProps.contentEn:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["Structure development is relatively complex. AntV Infographic provides reusable skills for ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/design#structure","children":"structures"}],", managed by any-skills, so both Claude Code and Codex can read and use them to generate high-quality code."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"development-prompt","children":"Development Prompt "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Structure rules and templates are packaged as a skill. The key files are:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":".skills/infographic-structure-creator/SKILL.md"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":".skills/infographic-structure-creator/references/structure-prompt.md"}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"They include the following:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Structure classification system (list, comparison, sequence, hierarchy, relationship, geographic, statistical charts)"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Technical specifications (type definitions, available components, utility functions)"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Code templates (simple structure, hierarchical structure)"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Layout calculation essentials"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Button layout principles"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Naming conventions"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Generation process"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Example code"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"usage","children":"Usage "}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"use-cli-ai","children":"Method 1: Use skills (Recommended) "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"In Claude Code or Codex, submit your request in one shot, for example:"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"Please use skill: infographic-structure-creator to build a circular flow structure. Items are arranged in a circle with arrows between neighbors to form a loop. Each item can be added or removed.
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"After generation, the AI will create the structure file and update exports. You only need to verify the layout and interactions in the Dev environment."}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"use-chat","children":"Method 2: Manual use in an AI chat "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"If you prefer to paste the reference yourself, read the skill reference:"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"cat .skills/infographic-structure-creator/references/structure-prompt.md
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Paste the content into your AI chat, then describe your requirements and generate code."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Regardless of which method you use, please verify that the layout and interactions meet expectations in the Dev environment before submitting."}]]}]]
